price: Mímọ́ ni fún Olúwa rẹ, Olúwa (tó ni) agbára, tayọ ohun tí wọ́n ń fi ròyìn (Rẹ̀).
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلۡعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbika rabbi al-ʿizati ʿammā yaṣifūna
